ACT
170.  
Disclosure of information during succession proceedings
A person entitled to initiate succession proceedings has the right to receive information from the notary during the succession proceedings concerning the fact who has accepted the succession and who has renounced the succession. A person who would have succeeded in the case of intestate succession has the same right in the case of succession on the basis of testamentary intention.
The persons specified in subsection 1 of this section have the right to examine also the results of the inquiries provided for in § 167 of this Act.
In the case of succession on the basis of testamentary intention, a person who would have succeeded in the case of intestate succession has the right to examine the will and the succession contract. The specified person has such a right also after the authentication of the succession certificate.
